episode_event_general_winter_2020/6701_1:
We were just about to do something fun with my
Togekiss and Erika’s Comfey!
Would you care to join us?
Yeah, it’s gonna be a lot of fun!
episode_event_general_winter_2020/6801_1:
A gift of joy...
How wonderful!
Let’s do our best so everyone can enjoy it!

Of course! We’re gonna deliver smiles to everyone
with our gift of joy!
